post:
Hello Guys!  
I've decided to start something new here, Check it out.  
  
You probably know me from my dirt-cheap NAT VPS servers, which are pretty great. But do you know what's even better? I do! A dirt-cheap dedicated IPv4 VPS!  
This exactly why I am hoping to start doing here. This is my first Dedicated IPv4 offer on a larger scale, I will be calling these plans "LVZ" Which stands for LittleVZ.  
Well, What are you waiting for! Take a look at the offer!  
  
This is the first discounted plans I have offered yet!

As always, if you have any questions please ask! I am here to help.  
  
LVZ-256MB  
256MB RAM  
5GB Disk Space  
250GB Bandwidth  
1 vCPU Core  
1 IPv4 Address  
/80 block IPv6 Address   
500Mbps - United Kingdom  
NO SUPPORT  
OpenVZ 7/SolusVM Control Panel  
No promo code needed  
[​$10/year in the United Kingdom  ](https://hosting.gullo.me/order/config/index/little-vz/?group_id=32&pricing_id=322&coupon=LVZ-256MB-2)  

LVZ-512MB  
512MB RAM  
10GB Disk Space  
500GB Bandwidth  
1 vCPU Core  
1 IPv4 Address  
/80 block IPv6 Address   
500Mbps - United Kingdom  
NO SUPPORT  
OpenVZ 7/SolusVM Control Panel  
No promo code needed  
[​$13/year in the United Kingdom  ](https://hosting.gullo.me/order/config/index/little-vz/?group_id=32&pricing_id=323&coupon=LVZ-512MB-3)  

LVZ-1GB+  
1GB RAM and up  
20 GB Disk Space and up  
1000GB Bandwidth  
1 vCPU Core  
1 IPv4 Address  
/80 block IPv6 Address   
500Mbps - United Kingdom  
NO SUPPORT  
OpenVZ 7/SolusVM Control Panel  
No promo code needed  
[​$16/year in the United Kingdom  ](https://hosting.gullo.me/order/config/index/little-vz/?group_id=32&pricing_id=324&coupon=LVZ-1GB-20)  

Standard pricing can be found,  
[Here  ](https://hosting.gullo.me/pricing)  

I am offering these servers myself and not as a company. If you have any questions or need support at any time it will always be me answering you, Because of this the whole support process will be more streamlined as you will only be talking with me. It is my goal to keep all users satisfied by any means and I will strive to do so.

Looking for something else? I can accommodate a wide range of applications. Send me a support ticket so I can set you up with a custom VPS offers!

Test IP VPS (UK): 51.77.117.75  

[View TOS Here.](https://hosting.gullo.me/tos)
